description: Indicates student's composite score for a given category
Indicates student's performance level at School level based on percentile
Indicates student's performance level at LEA level based on percentile
Indicates student's performance level at National level based on percentile
Displays the student’s numeric score on total items attempted
Displays the student’s numeric score on total items correct
Displays the student’s numeric score on IC per minute
Displays the student’s numeric score on items incorrect (Total Items - Items Correct)
Displays the student’s numeric score on total words read
Displays the student’s numeric score on total words read correctly
Displays the student’s numeric score on WRC per minute
Displays the student’s accuracy score using median
Displays the student’s growth percentile at school level
Displays the student’s growth percentile at district level
Displays the student’s growth percentile at national level
Displays the student’s growth percentile by start score
